meta.title: Operation of Single Punch Tablet Press

sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the operation of Single Punch Tablet Press for small-scale tablet production.
sections.scope: Applicable to tablet manufacturing activities carried out in the Pharmaceutics.
procedure: Ensure punches and die are clean and free from scratches.
Install the lower punch, die, and upper punch securely.
Adjust the lower punch position to set the tablet weight.
Adjust the upper punch travel to set the tablet hardness/thickness.
Fill the hopper with granules and rotate the fly-wheel manually for test.
Verify tablet quality and weight manually before starting power.
Power ON the machine and collect compressed tablets.
Perform weight and hardness checks periodically.
Stop the machine and clean all components after use.
Document settings and batch results in the logbook.
precautions: Always perform initial test rotations manually.
Do not place fingers near the die cavity during operation.
Ensure granules have proper flow and lubrication.
Stop the machine immediately if jamming occurs.
Clean and grease the machine parts after each use.
